snippet: The 30-second spot by Mayors Against Illegal Guns will run on CBS stations in the Washington D.C. market in an effort to push Congress to pass universal background checks on all gun purchases.
abstract: The 30-second spot by Mayors Against Illegal Guns will run on CBS stations in the Washington D.C. market in an effort to push Congress to pass universal background checks on all gun purchases.

headline.main: Gun Control Group Buys Ad Time for Super Bowl
